de.mpg.aai.shhaa.config
Class ConfigContext

java.lang.Object
  de.mpg.aai.shhaa.config.ConfigContext

public class ConfigContext
extends java.lang.Object

holds configuration context data (config file location, the loaded config), invokes loading the config and building the services

Author:
megger

getActiveConfigContext

public static ConfigContext getActiveConfigContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletCtx)
provides the current/active configuration context (expected/looked-up in the given Servletcontext)

the ConfigContext, null if not found

reload()

reload

public void reload()
(re)loads the configuration from the config file at location AND initializes hereafter the services (authn/z handler)

See Also:
ConfigLoader.load(ConfigContext), ServiceLoader#load(Configuration)

getConfiguration

public Configuration getConfiguration()
                               throws ConfigurationException
Returns:
the (loaded) actual configuration
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if not found (not loaded yet)

getAuthService

public HttpAuthService getAuthService()
                               throws ConfigurationException
Returns:
the (loaded/initialized) authn/z handler
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if not found (not loaded yet)
